review: I honestly never knew that a goat could explode a car, sending it flying into someones house landing on a treadmill and sending if flying back outside into a fence. This game also serves as an educational purpose too. 10/10

helpful: 2 of 3 people (67%) found this review helpful
review: As good as the dark decent? It has a different feel but a great story, full of must see events that will give you the hunger to play more. The dark decent and A machine for pigs are both great in it's horror ways, but A machine for pigs is a must play for scares, story and experience.

helpful: 2 of 4 people (50%) found this review helpful
review: This is what gaming has come too. Cleaning blood, picking up rubbish and disposing body parts. This game tried something different and actually did a fantastic job in my opinion. Worth getting but not to try out but to have an enjoyable space station janitor experience.
A game that will show you the true meaning of horror up close.
